duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide family medicine care to adult patients and the elderly.
Utilize evidence-based practice to diagnose and treat patients in a clinical setting.
Participate in the management of acute care cases with a focus on patient-centered care.
Collaborate with a team of clinicians to provide comprehensive care in line with the medical home model.
Manage patient records and information using the Epic EMR system.
Contribute to the growth and development of primary care services within the community.

education_certification.credential: Master's degree in Nursing with a specialization in Family Medicine or related field (DNP preferred)
